name: Cloak of the Sh'lori
data: It decreases the users strength adequately.
It decreases the users constitution pitifully.
It increases the users wisdom somewhat.
It increases the users intelligence somewhat.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'sense weakness'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'death wish'.
